attributes.action: RE-INSTATE DUSTMAN FROM NEWHAM WHO WAS SACKED FOR ACTING IN SELF DEFENSE! CASE DROPPED AT COURT POLICE AND COUNCIL CRITICSED BY THE JUDGE.
attributes.additional_details: D.COSGREE WAS ATTACKED BY 2 MEN INSIDE HIS REFUSE VEHICLE,1 MAN WAS SHOUTING HE WAS GOING TO STAB HIM,ACTING IN SELF DEFENCE 1 MAN WAS INJURED.Mr COSGREE WAS ARRESTED AND CHARGED.THE COUNCIL SACKED HIM BEFORE HIS CASE CAME TO TRIAL,THE CASE WAS DROPPED AFTER A WITNESS CAME FORWARD AND COROBARATED HIS VERSION OF EVENTS.THIS MAN HAS LOST EVERYTHING AND IS NOW UNEMPLOYED,WE CALL ON HIM TO BE RE-INSTATED HE IS AN INNOCENT MAN.WE WANT THE DEPARTMENT TO INVESTIGATE NEWHAM COUNCILS HANDLING OF THIS CASE.
